ValidationRule.description: If reason for contact is not disruption the case must have Hotel Booking Ref, Hotel Name , Check in and Check out date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR( TEXT(Reason_For_Contact_Dynamic_Package__c) = "Fraud", TEXT(Reason_For_Contact_Dynamic_Package__c) = "Hotel Complaint", TEXT(Reason_For_Contact_Dynamic_Package__c) = "On-The-Spot Hotel Complaints", TEXT(Reason_For_Contact_Dynamic_Package__c) = "Package Hotel Query", TEXT(Reason_For_Contact_Dynamic_Package__c) = "Relocation", TEXT(Reason_For_Contact_Dynamic_Package__c) = "Standalone Hotel Query" )
&&
OR( ISBLANK(Hotel_Booking_Reference__c), ISBLANK(Hotel_Name__c), ISBLANK(Original_Check_In_Date__c), ISBLANK(Original_Check_Out_Date__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a Hotel Reference, Hotel Name and Check in Dates
